resources.string: Thanks for using Screen Off.\nBefore Screen Off turing off your screen, it requires the activiting of your Lock the screen function. Upon activation, the screen will be off immediately.\nLater on, you can long press the Screen Off to bring up app shortcut and select Settings to do further configuration.

Thanks for using Screen Off!

Please rate this app and help to improve it by leaving your message.

To uninstall, your can press the uninstall button.
